tables.query: select * from an_stat  where regdate between '##START_DATE' and '##END_DATE'
select * from oapp where vstdate between '##START_DATE' and '##END_DATE' or entry_date between '##START_DATE' and '##END_DATE'
select v.* from ovst as o join ovst_vaccine as v on v.vn = o.vn where o.vstdate between '##START_DATE' and '##END_DATE' or o.vstdate between '##START_DATE' and '##END_DATE'
